TopicTitle: Initial position and camera in VAB

Articles.Content:
Every time I place root part in VAB, first thing I have to do with it is to pick it and draw it up to have room for my rocket below it.

My suggestion is for the initial position of first part in VAB (and initial camera position) to be changed to about half of VAB height.

Also after loading a ship from craft file, camera could move to center on its root part (or to nearest limit of VAB construction space if the root part appears outside of it).
